title: Mass grave with remains of 215 children found at Indigenous school in Canada, an 'unthinkable loss'
content:
1. Mass grave with remains of 215 children found at Indigenous school in Canada, an 'unthinkable loss'  USA TODAY
  2. Remains of 215 children found at former indigenous school site in Canada  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Investigation underway after remains of 215 children found at BC residential school site  Global News
  4. First Nation calls for respectful next steps after discovery of children’s remains in Kamloops  News 1130
  5. We grew up hearing horror stories of residential schools. The Kamloops children’s remains show — yet again — the truth of our peoples’ nightmare  Toronto Star
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カナダの先住民学校で215人の子供の遺体が入った大量の墓が発見され、「考えられない損失」となる
